entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
